chapters.title: Chapter 37:  What Might BeChapter 38:  Practice
chapters.info: Irella, p. 539 (475)—Skinny Accepted who tells Nynaeve that she is as clumsy as a cow and had half of the Talents. Nynaeve clouted her ear for this, and was sent to Sheriam's study. She is lanky, and bears a permanent frown.
